name: Meeting People
description: In Meeting People you will explore an endless path (or purgatory) and meet people (or souls of sinners). These people sometimes may tell you different things, sometimes they may not. The game offers you a wide variety of choices: you can interact with people and continue traveling; or you can interact with people, attack them AND continue traveling. The game was created during the 72 hour Mini Jam 119: Heaven². Limitation: Everything Can Die.
